content.body: presumably because it already has a different optional parameter?
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: presumably because it already has a different optional parameter?

content.body: Indeed, and `reduce` is arity sensitive so you can’t throw another optional argument after it.
content.formatted_body: Indeed, and reduce is arity sensitive so you can’t throw another optional argument after it.

org.matrix.msc1767.message.body: Indeed, and `reduce` is arity sensitive so you can’t throw another optional argument after it.
Indeed, and reduce is arity sensitive so you can’t throw another optional argument after it.

content.body:
```
> [].reduce(() => {})
Uncaught TypeError: Reduce of empty array with no initial value
    at Array.reduce (<anonymous>)
> [].reduce(() => {}, undefined)
undefined
```

content.body: In a parallel universe where Pepsi and Coke products coëxist in peace, the `basis` argument of `reduce` is required and `thisArg` is optional on the end.
